words.context: Described as mobile energy that can move in and out of a body; can come from animals, places, dead people, or other healers; can be positive or negative

words.meaning: universe; the energetic state of being
words.context: Like a day-to-day painting of one's being; subject to change like mood; represents the state of body, mind, and soul in a given moment; one's energetic home

Represents all connections with energies or spirits built along one's life-path, including connection to the Divine; can be visualized as images, stamps, or medicinal essence; can be positive or negative (dark magic)
Mentioned as part of visual representation in kano illustrations
